title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
For Task A, the response must correctly define authoritarianism.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe a difference between an authoritarian regimes and a democratic regime.

For Task C, the response must correctly explain a democratic regime may become authoritarian.

For Task D, the response must correctly explain why authoritarian regimes sometimes hold direct elections for government officials.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes all four of the tasks set by the question.
